data_scientist.title: Data Scientist
data_scientist.description: Data analysis, machine learning, Python, R, SQL, statistics, deep learning, data visualization, scikit-learn, pandas, numpy, model deployment, A/B testing, hypothesis testing, experimental design, big data analytics, data mining, predictive modeling, NLP, computer vision, time series analysis, Bayesian methods

software_engineer.title: Software Engineer
software_engineer.description: Software development, Python, Java, C++, JavaScript, algorithms, data structures, web development, databases, API design, cloud computing, Git, agile, DevOps, microservices, system design, CI/CD, unit testing, debugging, performance optimization, scalability

data_engineer.title: Data Engineer
data_engineer.description: Data pipelines, ETL, SQL, Python, big data, Apache Spark, Hadoop, data warehousing, data modeling, cloud platforms, data infrastructure, AWS, Azure, GCP, Airflow, Kafka, MongoDB, Redis, data governance, data quality, data security

ml_engineer.title: Machine Learning Engineer
ml_engineer.description: Machine learning, deep learning, Python, model deployment, MLOps, TensorFlow, PyTorch, model optimization, feature engineering, cloud platforms, distributed training, model serving, Docker, Kubernetes, model monitoring, ML pipelines, GPU optimization

frontend_developer.title: Frontend Developer
frontend_developer.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue.js, Angular, responsive design, UI/UX, web accessibility, TypeScript, Redux, state management, webpack, npm, browser APIs, cross-browser compatibility, performance optimization, SEO

backend_developer.title: Backend Developer

devops_engineer.title: DevOps Engineer
devops_engineer.description: CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, cloud platforms, infrastructure as code, AWS, Azure, GCP, monitoring, logging, security, automation, Jenkins, GitLab, Terraform, Ansible, Linux, shell scripting, networking

cloud_architect.description: Cloud architecture, AWS, Azure, GCP, infrastructure design, security, scalability, cost optimization, disaster recovery, high availability, networking, containerization, serverless, multi-cloud strategies
